FabricMessageTooLargeException Class

Definition

Exception indicating that Message is too large.

In this Article

[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("StyleCop.CSharp.MaintainabilityRules", "SA1402:FileMayOnlyContainASingleClass", Justification="Exception")]
public sealed class FabricMessageTooLargeException : System.Fabric.FabricException

ErrorCode

Constructors

FabricMessageTooLargeException()

Initializes a new instance of the FabricMessageTooLargeException class.

FabricMessageTooLargeException(String)

Initializes a new instance of the FabricMessageTooLargeException class with a specified error message.

FabricMessageTooLargeException(String, Exception)

Initializes a new instance of the FabricMessageTooLargeException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
